data.name: VAD_model_not_found__use_Basic_VAD_
data.value: VAD model not found, use Basic VAD?

data.name: Please_select_an_item_from_both_lists_
data.value: Please select an item from both lists.

data.name: Models_folder_not_found_
data.value: Models folder not found, please specify a valid folder in the Settings tab.

data.name: A_changed_setting_requires_the_model_to_be_reloaded__reload_now_
data.value: A changed setting requires the model to be reloaded, reload now?

data.name: ToolTip_textSystemPrompt
data.value: Tell the AI who or what to be, how to respond, or provide initial context.

data.name: ToolTip_textModelsPath
data.value: Path to the folder containing your .gguf model files.

data.name: ToolTip_numCtxSize
data.value: Context size (max tokens). Higher values improve memory but use more RAM.

data.name: ToolTip_numGPULayers
data.value: Number of layers to offload to GPU, more layers improve performance but increase GPU memory usage.

data.name: ToolTip_numTemp
data.value: Temperature controls randomness. Lower values make responses more deterministic; higher values produce more creative outputs.

data.name: ToolTip_numNGen
data.value: Number of tokens to generate per response (max length of the AI's reply), -1 = no limit.

data.name: ToolTip_comboNUMAStrat
data.value: NUMA (Non-Uniform Memory Access) strategy. Adjust if using multi-socket CPUs or specific memory configurations.

data.name: ToolTip_numRepPen
data.value: Repetition penalty reduces repetitive outputs. Higher values strongly discourage repeated phrases.

data.name: ToolTip_numTopK
data.value: Top-K sampling: limits token choice to the K most probable tokens, improving coherency.

data.name: ToolTip_numTopP
data.value: Top-P sampling: controls diversity by choosing from the smallest possible set of tokens whose cumulative probability exceeds this threshold.

data.name: ToolTip_numMinP
data.value: Min-P sampling: keeps only tokens whose individual probability is at least this fraction of the top token’s probability, trimming unlikely options and reducing noise.

data.name: ToolTip_numBatchSize
data.value: Batch size for processing tokens during generation. Higher values can improve performance at the cost of higher RAM usage.

data.name: ToolTip_groupCPUParams
data.value: Parameters controlling text generation on CPU.

data.name: ToolTip_numThreads
data.value: CPU threads for token generation. Typically, around 75% of your physical cores is optimal to prevent oversaturating the memory controller.

data.name: ToolTip_checkMMap
data.value: Map the model file to memory for on-demand loading, may improve model load times.

data.name: ToolTip_groupCPUParamsBatch
data.value: Parameters for the pre-generation step (batch preparation).

data.name: ToolTip_numThreadsBatch
data.value: CPU threads used for batch preparation.

data.name: ToolTip_numVadThreshold
data.value: Voice Activity Detection threshold: for Basic VAD this sets loudness, for Whisper VAD this sets speech probability.

data.name: ToolTip_numFreqThreshold
data.value: High-pass filter cutoff frequency. Higher values reduce low frequency noise.

data.name: ToolTip_checkSpeak
data.value: Speak the generated responses using the computers default voice.

data.name: ToolTip_checkVoiceInput
data.value: An intermediate check state (filled in) means it will transcribe spoken words without generating, when checked it will automatically generate.

data.name: ToolTip_textGoogleApiKey
data.value: A Google API key is required to use the search tool, you can get a free one for 100 searches per day.

data.name: ToolTip_textGoogleSearchID
data.value: Create your own Google Programmable Search Engine and copy its "Search engine ID" here.

data.name: ToolTip_checkFileListEnable
data.value: Enable the tool for listing the contents of a folder under the base path.

data.name: ToolTip_checkFileCreateEnable
data.value: Enable the tool for creating new files under the base path.

data.name: ToolTip_checkFileReadEnable
data.value: Enable the tool for reading the contents of files under the base path.

data.name: ToolTip_checkFileWriteEnable
data.value: Enable the tool for writing to files under the base path.

data.name: ToolTip_textFileBasePath
data.value: File access is relative to this path and canonically restricted to files and folders under this path only.

data.name: ToolTip_linkFileInstruction
data.value: Set an instruction to optimize the way the assistant uses the file tools.

data.name: ToolTip_numWakeWordSimilarity
data.value: Set how similar the detected wake word must be to activate transcription.

data.name: ToolTip_textWakeWord
data.value: Optional wake word phrase required before transcription begins.

data.name: ToolTip_radioBasicVAD
data.value: Use simple energy-based voice activity detection.

data.name: ToolTip_radioWhisperVAD
data.value: Use Whisper's neural VAD model for speech detection.

data.name: ToolTip_comboVADModel
data.value: Select the Whisper VAD model used for speech detection.

data.name: The_model_could_not_be_loaded_
data.value: The model could not be loaded.

data.name: Failed_to_create_the_model_context_
data.value: Failed to create the model context

data.name: The_chat_template_could_not_be_applied_
data.value: The chat template could not be applied.

data.name: The_model_backend_returned_a_decode_error_
data.value: The model backend returned a decode error.

data.name: An_index_was_out_of_range_
data.value: An index was out of range

data.name: The_GPU_is_out_of_memory_
data.value: The GPU is out of memory.

data.name: Unable_to_parse_the_chat_message_
data.value: Unable to parse the chat message

data.name: The_modified_settings_are_overridden_
data.value: The modified settings are overridden by the Model Settings for this model.

data.name: Max_context_size_of_last_loaded_model
data.value: Maximum context size of the last loaded model:

data.name: ToolTip_numGenDelay
data.value: Delay before automatic response generation after speech input ends (only when ‘Speech input’ is fully enabled).

data.name: ToolTip_textJinjaTmplModel
data.value: Specify the path to a text file containing a Jinja template, this file must remain in place.

data.name: ToolTip_checkFlashAttn
data.value: Enable Flash Attention. The filled state lets Llama.cpp choose automatically.

data.name: ToolTip_numCmdTimeout
data.value: Configure the timeout for commands, 0 means no timeout.

data.name: Editing_transcription_
data.value: Editing transcription - Press Enter to finish or Esc to cancel

data.name: Unable_to_connect_to_the_API_server
data.value: Unable to connect to the API server

data.name: The_API_request_was_canceled_before_completion
data.value: The API request was canceled before completion

data.name: Received_an_invalid_response_from_the_API_server
data.value: Received an invalid response from the API server

data.name: The_API_server_encountered_an_error
data.value: The API server encountered an error

data.name: Please_enter_a_valid_API_base_URL
data.value: Please enter a valid API base URL
